name: Centraal Bureau Levensmiddelenhandel
membership: CBL is an active member of EuroCommerce.
goal:
The Dutch Food Retail Association represents the Dutch supermarket organisations and food service companies. CBL represents members on all non-commercial issues such as food safety, sustainability, health issues, crime/theft, logistics and staff-training.

CBL has 27 members which includes almost 4300 stores and 300.000 employees.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Regulation 1169/2011, Regulation on official controls (2013/0140(COD)), regulation EG 517/2014, REFIT Claims direction. EU Platform on Food losses and Waste, Animal Wellfare
